product_title: Hangin' Out Dante Stripe Pocket Polo
product_description: Slim stripes race in heathered colors around a polo made for comfort from stretchy cotton jersey with a fit designed to be left untucked.
product_details_and_care:
Slim stripes race in heathered colors around a polo made for comfort from stretchy cotton jersey with a fit designed to be left untucked.
28" length (size Medium)
Button half-placket

product_size_info:
True to size.
Considered a Classic fit; cut generously with extra room through the chest, armholes and sides.
